content: all parts of the sheep are worked in the round - crochet in continuous rounds without a slip_stitch + chain at the beginning of each round simply end each round with single_crochet or whatever stitch is indicated for the pattern and move the stitch marker up and continue the pattern will state when a slip_stitch is necessary 2 copyright mysimplicitiesbymn 2025 all rights reserved
